en.title: Playwright Testing Services
en.name: Playwright
en.descriptionV1: Automate end-to-end testing across browsers, mobile emulation, and APIs with Playwright.
en.descriptionV2: We implement rock-solid Playwright suites that accelerate release confidence and reduce regressions.
en.additionalDescription: Our QA engineers integrate Playwright into CI/CD, observability, and development workflows to ensure reliable automation.

features.title: Cross-Browser Coverage
features.description: Run tests in Chromium, Firefox, WebKit, and mobile profiles with unified tooling.

features.title: Robust Locators
features.description: Use resilient selectors, tracing, and auto-waiting to minimize flaky tests.

features.title: API & Visual Tests
features.description: Extend automation beyond UI with API assertions and visual baseline comparisons.

features.title: CI/CD Integration
features.description: Plug Playwright into pipelines with parallelization, sharding, and actionable reporting.

process.title: Test Strategy
process.description: Identify critical user journeys, environments, and coverage goals for automation.

process.title: Framework Setup
process.description: Configure Playwright project structure, fixtures, and reusable utilities.

process.title: Suite Development
process.description: Author maintainable tests, data builders, and helper functions aligned with coding standards.

process.title: Stability & Reporting
process.description: Harden suites with retries, tracing, and dashboards surfaced in CI.

process.title: Knowledge Transfer
process.description: Train teams, document workflows, and evolve tests alongside product growth.
